DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect eleclazine shorten correct QT interval ( QTc ) , safety , tolerability adult type 3 long QT syndrome ( LQT3 ) . During single-blind treatment period ( 24 week ) , participant receive eleclazine and/or eleclazine placebo . Following single-blind treatment period , participant permanently discontinue study drug eligible , discretion investigator , continue receive eleclazine open-label extension phase .
